definition: fraction (of a distillate)/key (one component part of a distillate)
to distill/to break a liquid substance up into components by boiling
to steam/to cook in a steamer/to reheat cold food by steaming it

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The effect of feed aromaticity on the reactions of vacuum residue hydrotreating was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究摻入不同芳香性重餾分油對渣油加氫反應的影響。

sentences.english: With the rising of VGO distillate, the content of basic nitrogen gradually increases.
sentences.chinese: 隨着蠟油餾分的變重，鹼性氮含量呈遞增的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: Various solvent naphtha fraction generally have to go through refining.
sentences.chinese: 各種溶劑油餾分一般都需要經過精製加工。

sentences.english: Deacidification test for lube distillates by a compound solvent was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 一種複合脫酸溶劑被用於潤滑油餾分的脫酸實驗。

sentences.english: Gasoline and distillate stocks also fell.
sentences.chinese: 汽油和餾分油庫存也出現了下降。

sentences.english: Polysulfides was synthesized using FCC gasoline and sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 以單質硫和FCC餾分油爲原料合成有機硫化劑。

sentences.english: A volatile fraction of petroleum consisting chiefly of pentanes and hexanes.
sentences.chinese: 主要由戊烷和己烷組成的一種揮發性石油餾分。

sentences.english: This paper systematically introduced separation technology of cracked C5 residue abroad.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了國外裂解碳五餾分的分離技術。

sentences.english: Finally, the future development of inhibitors for cracking C5 fractions is prospected.
sentences.chinese: 最後展望了裂解碳五餾分阻聚劑今後的研究方向。

sentences.english: Light petroleum distillate, generally known AS naphtha, wAS the logical choice.
sentences.chinese: 輕石油餾分，如石腦油是合乎邏輯的選擇。

sentences.english: The naphtha fraction of the pyrolytic oil was objected to GC analysis.
sentences.chinese: 之後，對熱解油按不同餾分進行了更細入的分析。

sentences.english: The distillates more than 490 ℃ can be used as asphalt modifier.
sentences.chinese: 大於490℃的餾分可作爲瀝青改性劑。
